text: curiyan maraiyum (merkut) ticaivarai avar cenratainta potu, atu oru ceru kalanta niril (mulkuvatupol) maraiyak kantar; innum avar avvitattil oru camukattinaraiyum kantar; "tulkarnaine! Nir ivarkalai(t tantittu) vetanai ceyyalam; allatu avarkalukku alakiyatana nanmai ceyyalam" enru nam kurinom
